content: @Tim Abbott What commit is the 1.8 zip file based off of? I was going to upgrade from git for this
@Sean Wallitsch oops, I'd forgotten to push the tag. It's the 1.8.0-rc1 tag in Git.

BTW, @Tim April @Sean Wallitsch this release does include a change to the hotkey for "compose-a-pm" from "C" to "x" to make it easier to type; I'm sure it'll interfere with folks' finger memory. I'd appreciate any feedback on how your users experience it, in case we need to tweak anything in how it works.
i've had 2 complaints on the "C" to "x" so far
I'd certainly expect your folks who are used to barnowl in particular to complain, since the old hotkeys matched barnowl's.
